name: Leviathan
description: If more than 1 good player is executed, you win. All players know you are in play. After day 5, evil wins.
first_night_desc: Place the Leviathan 'Day 1' marker. Announce 'The Leviathan is in play; this is Day 1.'
other_night_desc: Change the Leviathan Day reminder for the next day.
